title: Isabel Wilkerson on caste in America
itunes:title: Isabel Wilkerson on caste in America
itunes:subtitle: Isabel Wilkerson discusses her new book, Caste: The Lies That Divide Us, which argues that the divisions in American society are best understood if it is viewed as a caste system. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist and author Isabel Wilkerson discusses her new book, Caste: The Lies That Divide Us, which argues that the divisions in American society are best understood if it is viewed as a caste system, and draws on comparisons with India and Nazi Germany. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
